includedAssets.title: Four Months Later...
includedAssets.synopsis: Four months after Peter's explosion, each character finds their life in a dramatically different place.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Four months after Peter's explosion, each character finds their life in a dramatically different place.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Four months after Peter's explosion, each character finds their life in a dramatically different place.

includedAssets.title: Lizards
includedAssets.synopsis: Ando and Matt investigate Kaito's death, while Mohinder tries to contain the virus and Peter agrees to help the people who found him.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ando and Matt investigate Kaito's death, while Mohinder tries to contain the virus and Peter agrees to help the people who found him.

includedAssets.title: Kindred
includedAssets.synopsis: Mohinder discovers some ominous artwork, Peter builds trust with the Irish gang and Hiro pushes Kensei towards his destiny.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mohinder discovers some ominous artwork, Peter builds trust with the Irish gang and Hiro pushes Kensei towards his destiny.

includedAssets.title: The Kindness Of Strangers
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - The Kindness Of Strangers
includedAssets.synopsis: The nature of Micah's cousin Monica's abilities begin to come to light, while Matt learns more about the man in Molly's nightmares.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The nature of Micah's cousin Monica's abilities begin to come to light, while Matt learns more about the man in Molly's nightmares.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The nature of Micah's cousin Monica's abilities begin to come to light, while Matt learns more about the man in Molly's nightmares.

includedAssets.title: Fight Or Flight
includedAssets.synopsis: A dangerous woman begins to search for Peter, with deadly consequences. Meanwhile, Hiro's mission in feudal Japan continues.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A dangerous woman begins to search for Peter, with deadly consequences. Meanwhile, Hiro's mission in feudal Japan continues.

includedAssets.title: The Line
includedAssets.synopsis: Peter and Caitlin travel to Montreal, West helps Claire find her confidence and Mohinder struggles with a difficult decision.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peter and Caitlin travel to Montreal, West helps Claire find her confidence and Mohinder struggles with a difficult decision.

includedAssets.synopsis: Mohinder struggles to produce a cure, Claire tries to move on and Peter attempts to destroy the virus in Texas.

includedAssets.title: Powerless
includedAssets.synopsis: Former friends face off as Peter fights to save the world in this dramatic finale to season two.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Former friends face off as Peter fights to save the world in this dramatic finale to season two.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Four months after the climactic events at Kirby Plaza, the survivors of the explosion attempt to adapt to their new reality, unaware of the looming presence of an even greater threat. Second season of the sci-fi thriller starring Hayden Panettiere.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Four months after the events at Kirby Plaza, the survivors of the explosion try to adapt to their new reality. Second season of the sci-fi thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Four months after the climactic events at Kirby Plaza, the survivors of the explosion attempt to adapt to their new reality, unaware of the looming presence of an even greater threat. Second season of the sci-fi thriller starring Hayden Panettiere.

includedIn.title: Heroes
includedIn.synopsis: After a group of ordinary people suddenly develop incredible superpowers, they find their lives interlinking as they attempt to save the world.
